name: Bernard Pivot Questionnaire
description: Interview your character using the ten questions from this questionnaire inspired by Marcel Proust

attributes.name: What is your least favorite word?
If you were reincarnated as some other plant or animal, what would it be?
What sound or noise do you hate?
Who would you like to see on a new banknote?
What sound or noise do you love?
What is your favorite curse word?
What profession other than your own would you not like to attempt?
If Heaven exists, what would you like to hear God say when you arrive at the Pearly Gates?
